Field Documentation

eolUint eolGraphicsConfig::frameDelay

all rendering will be scaled by this factor. default to 1

eolBool eolGraphicsConfig::fullScreen

if 1, outputs frame data to terminal

eolGraphicsView eolGraphicsConfig::graphicsView

minimum number of milliseconds to wait for drawing the next frame

eolDouble eolGraphicsConfig::scaleFactor

1 for full screen, 0 for window mode
